Unleash your culinary creativity with the app\'s vast selection of delicious and convenient meal recipes, ready for you to explore and enjoy.
Get started and discover your next favorite meal!
Discover new recipes and create your own with ease by simply tapping the Search icon.
Your collection shelf is currently empty.
Why not start by adding a collection that sparks your interest? Add your first collection by clicking on the button below. Let\'s get organizing!
"If you proceed, any ingredients data you've entered for this recipe will be lost when returning to the previous screen. "
What category suit your recipe the best?
Your custom recipe has been added. Happy cooking and bon appetit!
"After clicking the save button, you will no longer be able to modify the ingredients section. "
"After clicking the save button, you will no longer be able to modify the preparation section. "
If you proceed, the collection will be permanently deleted.
This recipe is already in the selected collection.

"To begin adding recipes, first select a recipe, click the 'Add' button, and then choose your desired collection. "
If you proceed, this recipe will be removed from this collection.
If you proceed, the content of the shopping list will be cleared.
Your shopping list is currently empty. Click on the add button to add an ingredient.
Never forget a recipe ingredient again! With our shopping list feature, you can easily note down all the ingredients needed for your favorite recipes.
Simply click on the shopping list icon on the navigation bar and add items with ease.
Try it out now and elevate your recipe game!
Looking for a way to keep your recipes organized and easy to access?
You can easily store your favorite recipes accessible with just a tap of the collection icon.
Don\'t know what to eat? Give it a try and explore today\'s meal, specially chosen to delight your taste buds!
Feel free to add your own recipes if you can\'t find what you\'re looking for!
It seems that you haven\'t created a recipe of your own yet. To add your very first recipe, you can press the button below and start adding the details of your recipe.
